text: Rajasthan Patrika (which means "The Rajasthan Newsletter") is a daily newspaper in Hindi and Rajasthani. It was started in 1956 by Karpoor Chandra Kulish. The newspaper is called Rajasthan Patrika in Delhi and Rajasthan, and simply Patrika in nine other states. According to the Indian Readership Survey 2013, Rajasthan Patrika was the fourth most-read Hindi newspaper in India, and Patrika was the sixth most-read. == References ==
title: Rajasthan Patrika
